content: All at once I saw a human form in the distance, and, to my surprise, soon recognized that the traveler was a woman.
translations: ita:Tutto a un tratto vidi una forma umana in lontananza, e, con mia sorpresa, ben presto riconobbi che il viaggiatore era u
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
